!Weapons Trader Stanford: Welcome, young traveler. Our shop deals exclusively with weapons. Most of the famous Knights of Aden choose our weapons for their quests. Now, take a look around. There are bound to be many weapons suited to your taste. So many weapons that you d feel secure just carrying around, so go on, make your choice.
